scripts.deploy: npm run cleanup && npm run t2:erase ; npm run build && npm run copy && cd build/ && npm run install:prod && npm run t2:push
scripts.local: npm run cleanup && npm run build && npm run copy && cd build/; export NODE_NOT_TESSEL=1 ; node index.js
scripts.device: npm run cleanup && npm run build && npm run copy && cd build/ && npm run install:prod && npm run t2:run
scripts.build: npm run cleanup; babel src --out-dir build
scripts.calibrate: npm run cleanup && npm run t2:erase ; npm run build && npm run copy && cd build/ && npm run install:prod && npm run calibrate:run
